title: ALSHOP.com Scores Big with Online Shoppers!
text:
(MENAFN Press) There's nothing like a good purchase and if the purchase is complimented with surprise gifts, one can never get enough. Leading e-tailer ALSHOP.com has gone an extra mile to surprise the online shoppers with offers galore to mark its 7th anniversary.

The month long 'The Big 7' campaign kicked off on 24th August, comprising unbeatable offers and lowest prices across categories like latest mobile phones, tablets, digital cameras, laptops, home entertainment, beauty and lifestyle products of renowned global and regional brands. Officials have confirmed that as guaranteed, 777 gifts have been given out and there's been a spurt in online traffic up to 40% with 750,000 online visitors during the campaign. "The Big 7" campaign was not only commercially successful, but also a great platform to interact with the online shoppers and create memorable shopping experiences. 

Conventionally it is believed that customers will flock to an online portal that offers a great deal or discount. However ALSHOP.com has earned a reputation of positive experiences, quick deliveries and responsive services which make customers come back to them time and again. Besides, the e-tailer always believes in the power of its customers and continually strives to connect with them in the best possible way. The "Big 7" Campaign was one such way of recognizing and rewarding loyal customers who have been supporting them over the years by giving them a fun experience. The gifts included AED 7% off vouchers, 77 vouchers, AED 777 vouchers, free gifts daily for 7 customers, movie tickets, lowest price on products across categories every 7th hour and even free skydive opportunities. The campaign also unveiled the first of its kind 'Elite Program' for a select group of loyal customers who have been with the e-retailer through the years. The invitation-only program which is exclusively for customers who have been regular buyers, offered extended discounts and power deals. 

The highlight of the online shopping fiesta was a free trip to Bali won by Dr.Sana Mehek, and she expressed her delight saying, "I have been shopping at ALSHOP.com for the last 2 years and always loved their service, fabulous deals and authentic products. While purchasing a Lenovo mobile this time, I never imagined I will end up winning a trip to Bali. I am thoroughly excited and thrilled and want to thank ALSHOP.com for their gesture." 

Sheriff Rizwan, CEO and Founder of ALSHOP.com, shared his views on "the Big 7" campaign saying, "As an annual celebration, we will continue to engage customers and offer them the best deals. For next year I can assure you, it will be bigger and better with more countries and more categories."
What makes ALSHOP.com one of the preferred online shopping destinations in the UAE is a wide array of authentic and genuine merchandise, quick delivery and phenomenal customer service. With more than 10,000 products listed on its website, ALSHOP.com has over 20,000 visitors every day. The company has partnered with nearly ten banks to make the process of online payment more secure and convenient for customers. ALSHOP.com also collaborates with these banks and other corporate institutions for tailored promotional activities and making payment options easier and affordable for buyers. 

About ALSHOP.com 
ALSHOP.com is an online shopping portal catering to consumers in the Middle East region. The company operates from Dubai, UAE and is part of Meast E-Commerce, a Dubai based Limited Liability Company. ALSHOP.com was started in 2008 and has been recognized as the official online retailer for well-known international brands such as Samsung, Braun and many others. Presently ALSHOP.com sells consumer electronics, IT equipment & smartphones, perfumes, home appliances, and wellness & beauty products. The range is expanding rapidly with several new products being added to the online shelves every day. ALSHOP.com caters to the demand of the growing market by going the extra mile to deliver purchases with utmost care and ease while providing the best-value. A 75 strong professional team works efficiently round the clock in fulfilling consumers' requirements. In an effort to come closer to customers and consistently deliver a superior e-shopping experience, the company plans to put itself on the map in over 12 countries spanning the entire MENA region by 2017.
